an5.89:4.1: “These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.89:4.3: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. And they don’t review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
an5.89:4.4: These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
an5.89:5.1: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.89:5.3: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company. And they review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
an5.89:5.4: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
